name: distribution-not-selected
description: Choose a distribution by running 'npm run apply:copay' or 'npm run apply:bitpay'.

scripts.start: echo && echo "Choose a distribution by running 'npm run apply:copay' or 'npm run apply:bitpay'." && echo
scripts.preapply: npm i fs-extra && git update-index --skip-worktree package.json
scripts.apply:copay: npm run preapply && cd app-template && node apply.js copay && cd .. && npm i
scripts.apply:bitpay: npm run preapply && cd app-template && node apply.js bitpay && cd .. && npm i
